title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
Role – Sr. Business Analyst / Business Consultant in Life Insurance domain

Experience: 10-18 yrs

Positions: 6 nos

Domain: Life Insurance

Qualification - BE/BTech/MCA /Mtech only

Location – Seawoods, Navi Mumbai, at Client Location

Notice Period: upto 30 days

Working week – 5 days with alternate Saturdays working from client location as per Bank norms




Job Description :




Business Analyst in Life Insurance domain

* Relevant experience min 5 yrs in Life Insurance domain- New business, Policy Servicing, Claims

* Ability to interact with the business users of a particular domain

* Ability to capture business requirements in detail

* Knowledge of Ingenium policy Admin System preferred.

* Ability to transfer the requirements to the technical team and test the deliverables

* Give suggestions for improvement of the process/systems etc – a value add.

* Technical knowledge on PL SQL preferred

* Work location - Client location-Seawoods, Navi Mumbai.

Show more
